alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 10 at 1:55PM PDT until September 10 at 4:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL INYO COUNTY... At 155 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Independence, Lone Pine, Independence Creek Campground, Oak Creek Campground, Sawmill Creek Campground, Onion Valley Campground, Goodale Creek Campground, Taboose Creek Campground, Tinemaha Campground, Whitney Portal Campground, Portagee Lake Campground and Tuttle Creek Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
